column4: what's a common partition setup for ubuntu server?  i was thinking of something like / (root) 7gigs, swap 2gigs, ~therest /var - is that reasonable? (i plan to log to this server from other servers, hence the larger /var)
is there anything wrong with the defaults?
not sure why you want a larger /var
the vmware files will soak up gigs fast.  why not have one big partition?
